name: Space zone defender
description:
Description

Space zone defender is an oldschool arcade style space shooter.
You can choose between different weapon sets and ship skins and try to survive as long as you can.
You unlock upgrade points on every play depending on your points to increase your ships durability, shot speed and many other things.
How long can you survive?

What has the game at the moment?

  • 3 ship skins
  • 8 Upgrades
  • 1 and 2 player (local)
  • 7 game modes
  • 3 difficulties
  • 3 shot modes
  • 64 achievements
  • 5 Highscores
  • ingame achievement view for steam achievements
  • ingame highscore view for steam highscores
  • 10 different enemies + 1 Boss enemy

Controls

  • 1 Player WASD and Space
  • 2 Player Arrow Keys + Enter

Whats planned In future?

Depending on the sales are future updates planned for more enemies, more game modes, more upgrades and also other control systems likes mouse control in some modes.

Before you buy it please ensure you know...

that this is a little minigame and not a AAA game. You can see what you get in the screenshots and the video. The game can change with more content in the future.
I tested all features, the achievements and highscores and tried to secure that all works without problems.
If you have any problems /ideas feel free to contact me in the steam discussion board
